tha-ap164:0.3_0: Hearing this portion of the senior monks,
tha-ap164:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
tha-ap164:1.3_0: With the help of a disciple
tha-ap164:2.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
tha-ap164:3.2_0: I wandered in the Saṅgha of monks.
tha-ap164:3.3_0: and having fulfilled the Buddha’s instructions,
tha-ap164:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap164:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap164:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāraṇasī.
tha-ap164:8.1_0: The second group of senior monks had been beaten by flowers.
